subject: Photographs of project site.
text: HTrdfy <4f4 <TTHT wfanro Fnxre '91-11-25074807/25093304 (ia %q , 44F 9ae7 #ir-Uruff #a) Extn 2223/2318/246812553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport ard Highways) 0-5 & 6, Sectar-10, Dwarka, New Dethl-110075 No 11041/21/2005-Admn; February 2, 2006 POLICY CIRCULAR ADMINSTRATONIFINANCE (114420061 [Dacision taken on MC Division'& note dated 21.08.2008] Sub: Photographs of Project Site reg; The National Highways being constructed are making considerable impact on the adjoining areas by aiding their growth and development: One of the ways t0 track this growth over years is to take photographs from vintage spots (from where a and reasonably detailed view of the adjoining area is possible) at regular intervals, say six months t0 a year: 2 It has been decided that al Project  Directors will select such spots a organize to have these photographs: The spots &d the angles from which the photographs are taken should be properly referenced and documented s0 that there is no difficulty in revisiting the site: The photographs should preferably be always taken from the same 3. The first set of photographs should be sent to the Librarian at the Headquarters by 15.02.2008 and repeated every six months This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI Yy (GP.
